title: CORRIGENDA
html:
CORRIGENDA

In the Autumn 1999 issue there were (at least) two errors. First, we left contributor Howard Richler's name off his review of the new Microsoft Encarta World English Dictionary. Mr. Richler writes from Montreal, Canada. Also, we misidentified the makers of Crayola brand crayons. They are, and have always been, Binney and Smith, rather than “Binnie and Smith.” Our apologies for these oversights and errors.
preview:
CORRIGENDA

In the Autumn 1999 issue there were (at least) two errors. First, we left contributor Howard Richler's name off his review of the new Microsoft Encarta World English Dictionary. Mr. Richler writes from Montreal, Canada. Also, we misidentified the makers of Crayola brand crayons. They are, and have always been, Binney and Smith, rather than “Binnie and Smith.” Our apologies for these oversights and errors.
